register.title: Please fill these fields with perfect data to be able to signup in our website

lang.title: Select Your Favourite Language
lang.desc: A language is not just words. It's a culture, a tradition, a unification of a community, a whole history that creates what a community is. It's all embodied in a language

terms.title: Terms and Conditions

desc.role1: The customer has the right to use his subscription for a maximum period of 90 days from the dateof starting, as the subscription will be canceled automatically after this period.
desc.role2: Incase the customer want to make any amendment, the customer service must be notified by email or by WhatsApp (0522089620) 24 hours before the date of amendment, up to 06:00 p.m.
desc.role3: The customer is not entitled to amend his meals, and in case he wants to make changes to the meals, an additional fee will be paid and this amount will be determined by the main office.
desc.role4: The meal delivery service starts from 10 in the morning until 10 in the evening, seven days a week, except for Thursday, when meals are taken in the next day
desc.role5: The driver's waiting time at the place of delivery agreed with the customer is only 10 minutes from the moment the driver arrives at the place where the customer is informed of the approximate delivery times of the place of delivery at the beginning of the subscription and incase the customer does not respond to the call, the meals will be saved in the nearest branch of Low Calories.
desc.role6: The customer has the right to Re-fund The Remaining Money unless the subscription exceeds 5 days from the start date in accordance with the financial terms and conditions of the company.
desc.role7: If the customer changes the subscription plan, he will be entitled to an amount of 157.5 dirhams, including tax

terms.title2: Financial terms and conditions of the company
terms.title2_desc: 2.65% of the amount paid on the card is deducted when subscribing as a banking service and it is deposited to the customer in the agreed bank account within 3 days from the date of canceling the subscription.
terms.accept: I accept the terms and conditions

monthlyPlans.desc: It's more than just high quality food, it's growing the food in a way that does not harm the environment. That gives me emotional well-being that is important to me.

allPrograms.desc: Low Calories serves healthy balanced food using high-quality ingredients. We offer specific nutritional plans for weight loss or weight gain, vegetarian plans, and other programs
